meanings.sent1: The children were gleeful when they saw the colorful balloons at the party.
meanings.sent2: She had a gleeful smile on her face as she opened the present.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's gleeful barks filled the room with happiness.
meanings.sent4: Her gleeful laughter echoed through the house, spreading joy.
meanings.sent5: The gleeful dance of the leaves in the wind was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: His gleeful expression lit up the room with happiness.
meanings.sent2: The gleeful cheers of the crowd filled the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The gleeful songbirds chirped merrily in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The gleeful colors of the rainbow painted the sky after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The gleeful celebration lasted long into the night.
